description: A Flutter provider class managing a list of Vehicle objects; interacts with a DataSource to fetch and update vehicle data.

classes.name: VehiclesProvider
classes.description: A provider class that manages a list of Vehicle instances, allowing them to be loaded asynchronously and notifying listeners upon updates.

methods.name: VehiclesProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing the provider with a data source.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the list of vehicles from the data source and notifies listeners of changes.
